mapper.select: SELECT id, file_type, file_name, file_url, create_time FROM t_upload_file limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file_detail(society_code, name, type, principal, business_scope, create_date, operating_period, operating_place, file_id) VALUES(#{societyCode}, #{name}, #{type}, #{principal}, #{businessScope}, #{createDate}, #{operatingPeriod}, #{operatingPlace}, #{fileId})
mapper.update: UPDATE file_detail SET society_code = #{societyCode}, name = #{name}, type = #{type}, principal = #{principal}, business_scope = #{businessScope}, create_date = #{createDate}, operating_period = #{operatingPeriod}, operating_place = #{operatingPlace} WHERE file_id = #{fileId}
